name: Trains, force shields and zombies
description:
Your train is under siege by zombies!

In this game you have to manage your resources well to avoid that the whole situation gets out of control quickly.

This is an endless arcade game. You move resources from one side of the train to the other to keep it running.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move and the "Z" to grab  ammo, shield energy and fuel.  You will automatically drop objects when you get close to the right place.

This game was made within 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 gamejam. This game uses copyright free graphics and sound from the internet.

This game was made by one person.
